psdcms.frontend
Class FrontendImpl

java.lang.Object
  psdcms.frontend.FrontendImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController, ResultAnnounce
public class FrontendImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResultAnnounce, java.lang.Runnable, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController

This class is responsible for FrontEnd component. It implements ResultAnnounce interface as its server interface and also it has FEPublishTask member as its client interface

Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Amir Moulavi (moulavi@kth.se), Uwe Dauernheim (uwe@dauernheim.net)
